comments.body: nit: I don't see why this method and `diskSetup(...)` need to be in a separate file, just put them in line in `TearDownAt(...)` and `SetUpAt(...)`
`disk_manager.go` is mostly shared by `iscsi`, `rbd`, and this `fc`. The plan is to consolidate them after the block volumes are there.
Ok, I see that it'll make it easier to refactor out later.
